profile.heading: Profile
profile.content: I can describe myself as a creative frontend developer with a healthy dose of humor and empathy. Driven by self-study and passionate about developing interactive websites.

workData.position: Frontend Developer Uniware Computer Systems B.V.
bulletpoints: Frontend development, application for the plant industry

I have enjoyed working on renewing the existing application for growers in the flower and plant industry. This was a text-based application, built in C/C++ that had to look more modern and much more intuitive for the end user. I have been working on the UI using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and Vue.js. In addition, I have renewed existing websites for various customers and transferred it to a modern CMS on WordPress.
HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, SQL, Wordpress CMS.
HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, SQL, Wordpress CMS.
Google Ads, Google Analytics, Google Tag manager.
HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, SQL, Wordpress CMS.

workData.position: IT support / Commercial procurement Hoykon B.V.
bulletpoints: Logistics for INTL. customers (Hitachi, Biogen, Cell Signaling Tech.)
Recruit new business and upgrade existing packages.
Acquire new business for catering and SME companies.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.content: These are a number of projects that I have enjoyed working on with great pleasure. They range from HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React and Vue.js to Salesforce.com projects.

projectsData.projectInfo: A digital bookshelf to keep your favorite e-books in order. Nodejs, Express.js, MongoDB database, Javascript, EJS, HTML and CSS.
A full stack todo app with a Node.js backend, Express.js server, MongoDB database, Javascript, EJS, HTML and CSS.
Easily and quickly upload .csv files and view all data sorted alphabetically in a clear table. React, Javascript, HTML and CSS.
A cool portfolio template with a star on Github. Built with React, Javascript, HTML and CSS.
A Python Tkinter GUI password manager for creating and storing passwords. Python, Tkinter and JSON.
Company website for 4-Attention. A distributor for accessories in the flower and plant industry. WordPress, PHP, Javascript, Bootstrap and Sass.
Company website for 4-Bulk. A wholesaler for accessories in the flower and plant industry. WordPress, PHP, Javascript, Bootstrap and Sass.
A clean and sleek real estate template built with passion and React, Javascript, Bootstrap and Sass.
A cool startup template built with React. Free to use. React, Javascript, Bootstrap and Sass.
